name: Play
lyrics:
Play - K-391/Alan Walker/Tungevaag/Mangoo
   
Lyrics by：Øyvind Sauvik/Mattias Brann/Martin Tungevaag/Alexander Standal Pavelich/Halvor Folstad
   
Composed by：K-391/Alan Walker/Mattias Brann/Martin Tungevaag/James Njie/Edvard Normann/Kristoffer Haugan/Anders Frøen/Alexander Standal Pavelich/Halvor Folstad/Øyvind Sauvik
   
Vocals by：Torine Michelle Bjåland
   
Backing Vocals by：Torine Michelle Bjåland
   
Vocal Production by：STATE
   
Produced by：K-391/Alan Walker/Tungevaag/Mangoo
   
Co-production：James Njie/STATE/Skinny Days
   
Additional Production：Mood Melodies/Omar Omrani
   
Executive Produced by：Gunnar Greve
   
Performed by：K-391/Alan Walker/Tungevaag/Mangoo/Torine Michelle Bjåland
   
Programming by：K-391/Mangoo/Alan Walker/Tungvaag/James Njie/STATE/Mood Melodies/Halvor Folstad
   
Instruments by：Edvard Normann (guitar)
   
Recorded at：MER Studios, Uranienborgveien 1 Studio, Skippergata 28 Studio (Oslo, Norway)
   
Mixed by：Sören von Malmborg at Basecamp Studios, Stockholm
   
Mastering by：Sören von Malmborg at Cosmos Mastering, Stockholm
   
We used to hide under the covers
我们曾总是将自己隐藏于伪装的面具之下
Serenade each other with careless melodies
漫不经心的为彼此唱着小夜曲
Something buried deep inside us
似乎有什么深埋于你我心底
The major and the minor
大调 小调
We're like piano keys
我们犹如那琴键
You played for me
你为我奏响的旋律
You played for me
你为我奏响的旋律
You played for me
你为我奏响的旋律
I swear it
我发誓
Even in my sleep I hear it
睡梦中我仍能听到那旋律回荡
Like the memory of every thing we used to be
仿佛记忆中 我们的点点滴滴
You played for me
你为我奏响的旋律
You played for me
你为我奏响的旋律
You played for me
你为我奏响的旋律
We couldn't stop the world from turning
我们无法阻挡这世界沦为沧海桑田
It was like a whirlwind
就像一阵旋风
Scattered us like leaves
将你我如落叶般吹散
But I'm stuck inside a feeling
但心底我仍执着的相信
The song that never leaves
那首属于我们的歌依然回荡
We were like a symphony
我们之间仿佛一首和谐乐章
You played for me
你为我奏响的旋律
You played for me
你为我奏响的旋律
You played for me
你为我奏响的旋律
I swear it
我发誓
Even in my sleep I hear it
睡梦中我仍能听到那旋律回荡
Like the memory of every thing we used to be
仿佛记忆中 我们的点点滴滴
You played for me
你为我奏响的旋律
You played for me
你为我奏响的旋律
You played for me
你为我奏响的旋律
You and me
你与我
You and me me
你与我
You and me me
你与我
You and me
你与我
You and me me
你与我
You and me
你与我
You played for me
你为我奏响的旋律
I swear it
我发誓
Even in my sleep I hear it
睡梦中我仍能听到那旋律回荡
Like the memory of every thing we used to be
仿佛记忆中 我们的点点滴滴
You played for me
你为我奏响的旋律

comments.content: Alan walker 在庆祝开学了？

教主新歌《PLAY》上线啦！！！ 超级好听啊！！！ 五天前是教主的22岁生日哦，在这里想对教主说一句晚来的生日快乐🎂🎂🎂 “我和参与制作的每一个人，K-391，Martin Tungevaag还有Mango都对这首歌感到非常兴奋” 现在Walkers一定也对这首歌非常兴奋吧！  让我们一起在这场电音盛宴中PLAY吧！ 大爱教主❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️                 让我上个热门😏😏

因为《Faded》认识艾伦， 因为艾伦认识电音， 因为电音深爱艾伦， 因为艾伦深爱《Faded》, 因为艾伦深爱艾式电音， 因为艾式电音生活充满节奏， 因为节奏生活充满激情， 因为激情生活充满活力， 因为活力生活充满阳光， 因为阳光生活充满希望， 因为希望生活充满正能量。 这都是《Faded》的功劳， 这都是艾伦的功劳。 谢谢艾伦的电音支持我学习了无数个日夜， 现在上网课做作业还放艾伦的音乐。沉迷艾伦无法控制，沉迷电音无法自拔。 感谢艾伦电音一直支撑我走到现在，未来还需要艾伦电音的支持。 大爱艾伦沃克❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤ 陌生人，打字不易，你想现在给个赞继续听歌，还是一会再给？😁
没几天就999了，alan的粉丝真多，可以来集合了
